text: Ra hamile yasta dherai jinna (danava) ra manisaharu narkako nimti srsti gareka chaum, tiniharuko hrdaya chan tara jasabata bujhdainan, ra tiniharuko amkha chan, tara tyasabata dekhdainan, ra uniharuko kana chan, jasabata sundainan. Yi manisaharu pasu samana chan baru tyasabhanda pani badhi (pathabhrasta) chan, yiniharu nai aceta chan
